children.value: Thank for joining us Mr. Jayoma.
While we understand that you are only doing your job.
At the end there is no place to sex offenders between us.

children.name: Name2
children.value: Mr Jayoma please do everything you can to save my reputation sir.

children.name: Value
children.value: Mr. Jayoma uhhh thanks for having me here.

children.name: Value
children.value: Look man I'm going to be honest this case is causing me a lot of issues and I'm about to lose my job because of it.
I've been falsely accused of sexual harrasement and the lady made it a public case.
Mr Jayoma please do everything you can to save my reputation sir.

children.name: Value
children.value: Thanks for clarifying Mr. Jayoma. We trust that the jury will do you justice.
